alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Northern Valley; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 9:38PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Daniels, Roosevelt, northeastern Valley, Sheridan, northern McCone, northwestern Dawson and northwestern Richland Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 937 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Brockton, or 13 miles southeast of Poplar, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Point, Plentywood, Scobey, Poplar, Culbertson, Richland, Brockton, Medicine Lake, Froid, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Peerless, Port Of Whitetail, Lustre, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Redstone and Frazer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
